title: Sonic-Scribe Music Transcriber
description: Sonic-Scribe is a sheet music sharing platform that can transcribe audio files directly into sheet music using various machine learning frameworks. SonicScribe was developed with a small team as our Undergraduate Capstone Project.

title: Detecting Geese using YOLOv8
description: Developed a machine learning model to detect and count geese in images and videos using YOLOv8, optimizing detection accuracy through various configurations. Created an annotated dataset, and demonstrated the model's effectiveness for wildlife monitoring.

title: Cave Deck Builder Rougelike
description: Navigate a shifting dungeon, evade guardians and spirits, and strategically build your deck to collect the artifact and escape. Your survival hinges on stealth, strategy, and the luck of the draw.

title: Pong
description: A recreation of the game Pong on a DE10 Standard FPGA Development Board using the built-in LCD and 7-segment displays for output, and a pair of GPIO analog dials to control the paddles.

title: Unity RPG
description: Embark on an epic Unity RPG adventure, battling monsters and bosses as 3 distinct characters, each with unique combat styles and abilities. Customize your heroes through a skill tree and gear up with equipment from specialized shops.
